ygData.msgSnippet: At 02:00 AM 7/24/99 -0700, you wrote: The charisma buff is very nice. Sympathetic Aura. Also Tashani is basically a must have. And finally depending on ifg you
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:00 AM 7/24/99 -0700, you wrote:

The charisma buff is very nice. Sympathetic Aura. Also Tashani is basically
a must have. And finally depending on ifg you use yoru pet alot the pet is
nice too. If your itno research, Berserker str and color shift are both good.
It depends alot on your playing style, which is why my top two picks are
sympathetic aura and tashani: theya re always useful to an enchanter no
matter what hes doing. Good luck.


>From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
>I just recently reached level 20, but to my dismay, i can only afford one
>spell. and i dont know which one to get, do you guys have any suggestions?
>
>-Aeramus
